attributes.action: The Common Sense Ebola patition! Stop the spread!
attributes.additional_details:
We have a responsibility as a worldwide family to look after this world & the families we have been born too.
It would seem that our world governments are treating the Ebola crisi with surprising calm.
This illness has the potential to become a world wide break out yet... We are treating this illness with a serious lack of respect.
We need to petition all world wide governments to impose a minimum quarantine from those countries directly effected. This is to both contain & protect those countries effected & those volunteers that could potentially effect the countries & families they are from. Need I remind, that we impose far stricter controls on animals & livestock that actually pose a far significant threat. Thank you.
